question_stem.en: A 43-year-old man comes to the hospital due to recurrent episodes of fever and sore throat despite multiple antibiotic courses. For the past several months, he has also felt "run down" and fatigued all the time. His wife adds that he bruises easily and has had bleeding gums on several occasions. Temperature is 37.8 C (100.2 F). On physical examination, he has mucosal pallor, pharyngeal erythema, and multiple ecchymoses on his extremities. Peripheral blood smear is shown in the image below: {{exhibit_1}}
question_stem.zh: 一名43岁男性因反复发热和咽痛就诊，尽管多次使用抗生素治疗。过去几个月，他还感到"虚弱"和一直疲劳。他的妻子补充说，他很容易擦伤，并且曾多次出现牙龈出血。体温37.8°C（100.2°F）。体格检查显示，他有黏膜苍白、咽部红斑和四肢多发瘀斑。外周血涂片见下图：{{exhibit_1}}

question.en: Which of the following chromosomal abnormalities is most likely present in the affected cells?
question.zh: 受影响的细胞中最有可能存在以下哪种染色体异常？

summary.en:
This question tests knowledge of acute promyelocytic leukemia (APML), a subtype of acute myeloid leukemia (AML), and its characteristic cytogenetic abnormality, t(15;17). It also assesses the ability to recognize Auer rods on peripheral blood smear, which are indicative of AML. 

To solve this question, recognize the clinical presentation of AML (fatigue, fever, bleeding) and the presence of Auer rods on the peripheral blood smear. Then, recall that t(15;17) is the characteristic translocation associated with APML, the M3 subtype of AML.
summary.zh:
这道题考察了对急性早幼粒细胞白血病（APML，一种急性髓细胞白血病（AML）的亚型）及其特征性细胞遗传学异常t(15;17)的认识。它还评估了在外周血涂片上识别Auer小体的能力，Auer小体是AML的指示。 

要解决这个问题，需要认识到AML的临床表现（疲劳、发热、出血）和外周血涂片上Auer小体的存在。然后，回想起t(15;17)是与APML相关、AML的M3亚型的特征性易位。
